# elhussainy.pages.dev

This is a bilingual portfolio (English/Arabic). Canonical routes are prefixed with `/en` and `/ar`.

## Key pages (English)
- https://elhussainy.pages.dev/en
- https://elhussainy.pages.dev/en/projects
- https://elhussainy.pages.dev/en/services
- https://elhussainy.pages.dev/en/blog
- https://elhussainy.pages.dev/en/contact
